CVE.summary: Integer overflow in the NewIdArray function in Mozilla Firefox before 3.5.16 and 3.6.x before 3.6.13, and SeaMonkey before 2.0.11, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a JavaScript array with many elements.

vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN
